description.raw: This PR should fix the segfaults that have been occurring on macOS tests and now even [on Ubuntu tests](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/236/acropolis-enforce-component-type/diff#comment-96647550). The segfaults occur because an iterator is getting invalidated while iterating through `systemsPreupdate`. The solution is to add systems to a queue so that the vector doesn't change while it's being iterated over. The systems are actually added to the runner when `SimulationRunner::Run` is called. Note, however, that the `System::Configure` call still happens immediately from `SimulationRunner::LoadPlugins`.
